snippet: Jeb Bush is pulling no punches, assailing his rival for the Republican presidential nomination in a new online advertisement titled “The Real Donald Trump,” in which Mr. Trump is called a fake conservative.
abstract: Jeb Bush is pulling no punches, assailing his rival for the Republican presidential nomination in a new online advertisement titled “The Real Donald Trump,” in which Mr. Trump is called a fake conservative.

byline.original: By ALAN RAPPEPORT and MAGGIE HABERMAN

headline.main: Jeb Bush Video Takes Aim at Donald Trump’s ‘Manhattan’ Mind-Set
